title: Forasmuch as for His Majesties service, we hold it fit that all officers of His Majesties army now in this kingdom, as well members of Parliament, as others, attend their duties at their several and respective quarters ...
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
notes: At head of title: [Lo]rd Lieutenant General, and General Governour of Ireland, Ormonde.
"Given at His Majesties castle of Dublin the 22th. of May. 1663."
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
